item.description:
This will be a general game meet up. Come and bring your favorite game with you.

The Salem Athenaeum has given us their space to use for the afternoon (until 6ish). They have some large tables that are great for game playing. Also, if the weather is nice, there is a back porch and yard space as well.

Joe and I are hoping to use one of the tables to set up a Heroscape* scenario on, but we are also bringing an assortment of other games (you know we come prepared).

The Athenaeum is open to the public until 2pm, so please feel free to come a little early and check out the space.

 

*Here is a link with some info about Heroscape:

http://www.hasbro.com/games/kid-games/heroscape/default.cfm?page=Inside
item.how_to_find_us: Enter front door; look for Carolyn and Joe.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday afternoon games
